title: Found in street, need I.D. (dutch)
content:
been wondering what this is for a while now.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RIMG0002_5045.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RIMG0003_5767.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RIMG0004_5792.jpg)
author: serviceforthepeople

comments.content: Hand painted. Have a look at [FF Schmalhans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_schmalhans_ot/).

Also have a look at [Binner Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/binner-gothic/) caps or [TF Hotelmoderne](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/050806_TFHotelmoderne_2c5a.html)

- Mike Yanega
Those are lovely. Have you got photos of any more?

René Knip has created some nice typefaces based on (and in some cases, intended for) Dutch street lettering. I don't think they're available for licensing, but they can be admired here:

[http://www.atelierreneknip.nl/portfolio/type-design/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828/http:/www.atelierreneknip.nl/portfolio/type-design/ "http://www.atelierreneknip.nl/portfolio/type-design/")  
 [http://www.atelierreneknip.nl/portfolio/environmental/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719192828/http:/www.atelierreneknip.nl/portfolio/environmental/ "http://www.atelierreneknip.nl/portfolio/environmental/")

thanks for the response !

justin- no, these are the only ones i found... in a window down the street from my house
